name: Tutu Fabulous Apron - Black Raspberry (Ladies)
description:
Flaunt your fashion sense, glam up your kitchen and make every meal absolutely unforgettable with an apron from the Tutu Fabulous Collection! A flouncy, flirty removable tutu adds a dash of sass to classic polka dots, pearls and lace. A voluminous flower pin with a large pearl center adds a girly touch, and the deep, puckered pockets are adorned with a hand-finished pearl and lace trim. Both the apron (including the pockets) and tutu are fully lined, and tie at the neck and the waist for a fitted, flattering silhouette. Each apron comes beautifully packaged in a gloss pink box and makes the perfect bridal shower, birthday or “just because” gift! 

A portion of your purchase will be donated to selected charities dedicated to empowering those in our communities who need it most by providing education, training and hunger relief, so you can feel good about your purchase! 

One Size Fits Most
Dry Clean Only

Apron Shell: 	100% Cotton
Lining:		100% Cotton
Tutu Frill: 	        100% Polyester

name: Tutu Fabulous Apron - Black Raspberry (Girl's)
description:
Who says you can’t dress up and play with your food? Every little girl becomes a princess, and the kitchen her kingdom with an apron from the Tutu Fabulous Collection! A flouncy, two-toned removable tutu adds just the right amount of fun to classic polka dots, pearls and lace. A dainty flower pin adds a girly touch, and the puckered pockets are adorned with a hand-finished pearl and lace trim… perfect for hiding secret treasures! Both the apron (including the pockets) and tutu are fully lined, and tie at the neck and the waist for a perfectly fitted silhouette. Each apron comes beautifully packaged in a gloss pink box for a gift that will be cherished and shared for many years to come. 

A portion of your purchase will be donated to selected charities dedicated to empowering those in our communities who need it most by providing education, training and hunger relief, so you can feel good about your purchase! 

One Size Fits Most
Dry Clean Only

Apron Shell: 	100% Cotton
Lining:		100% Cotton
Tutu Frill:  	100% Polyester
